# The bcmath extension

Configure the `bcmath` extension.

This extension provides Basic Calculator (BC) style precision math support.

## PHP_EXT_BCMATH

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_BCMATH_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
